item.title: Migrating to Hugo Engine
item.description:
I have migrated my old Wordpress blog to Hugo. Since I am not a web publishing expert, I have nothing to say other than the experience was very nice and flexibility is awesome. Markdown + VS Code + git rule them all!

I didn’t have enough patience to setup Jekyll with all its dependencies hell a while ago. Wordpress was easy to install from WebMatrix and to run on IIS, but I was afraid to touch anything because the entire setup looked fragile.

Hugo is super fast and doesn’t interfere with writing workflow, gives total control and a hope that I could publish all the overdue posts about Spreads and related things soon.
